The video was published on Facebook on A: 2019, and has been viewed more than 131,000 times and shared more than 11,000 times.
The video shows police officers climbing: 3. The caption of the Facebook post translates to English as: "The puppet media is busy in showing that Kashmiris are at peace."
The claim in the Facebook post is false: as the footage has been circulating in media reports since at least 2013 about a police raid in the Pakistani city of Faisalabad.
